name: Rush for Berlin Gold
description: By the creators of Panzer Elite Action: Stormregion; this real-time strategy title will once more take you onto the European battlefields of the Second World War. 1944–1945: In a race for the German capital Berlin, you take command of American, British, French and Soviet Red Army forces.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 2000, XP with SP1 or XP64Processor: Pentium® 4 with 1.7 GHzMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: DirectX® 9.0c-compatible 3D-Graphicscard with at least 32 MB RAM (ATI Radeon 8000 or GeForce 3)DirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c-compatible 3D-Graphicscard with at least 32 MB RAM (ATI Radeon 8000 or GeForce 3)Hard Drive: 7.0 GB free HDD spaceSound: DirectX® 9.0c-compatible 16 Bit-Soundcard

reviews.review_text: What I like most of this game is the 3D battles. It's very similar to COH series even if COH is far more advanced and has base building, ect.
try it for the price of an icecream if ya like . for a 7gig download there is alot better games out there .
